import React from 'react'; import List from './list'; import {useState} from 'react' import { Link, Route} from "wouter" import Probando from "./prueba" import Modal from "./Modal" function ProductSection(props){ const [dataFiltered, setDataFiltered] = useState([...props.data]) const handleChange = (event) => { const value = event.target.value console.log(value) if (value === "All") { setDataFiltered(props.data) } else { setDataFiltered(props.data.filter(product => product.type === value)) } } const openModal = () => { console.log("Open modal") } return (
